pre_caption: This scenery shot pans across a fantastical, industrial-style building that resembles a stone castle. The structure is adorned with a complex network of brightly colored pipes in red, yellow, purple, and green, running along its walls beneath a large, arched glass roof. A prominent, tall tower with red and white candy-cane stripes completes the whimsical and imaginative setting.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
